original: 鑒於漢末察舉制失能、地方官吏門閥把持、賄選極盛；創設九品中正制，將曹魏人才選拔權收歸中央。
text: In view of the ineffectiveness of the inspection system in the late Han Dynasty, the control of local officials, and the extreme bribery selection; the nine-grade Zhongzheng system was created, and the selection of Cao Wei talents was returned to the central government.
